column4: Hi. I just compiled a custom kernel for oneiric, but in grub it shows up in the "Previous Linux versions" submenu. I can I make grub move it to top level?
Probably move the menuentry to another file in /etc/grub.d/
How?= From what i've seen, the entries in grub.d are quite complex
Just rip out the existing entry, create a new file (with proper naming syntax) and paste it there -- I'm no fan of grub2 so I can't tell it more precisely
